attributes.action: Ban ticket resale at inflated prices on 3rd party sites owned by original seller
attributes.additional_details: Viagogo, GetMeIn, SeatWave, ALL of them are owned by TicketMaster and they con people out of seeing their favourite artist for a respectable price. It's disgusting.
attributes.background: Ticketmaster, or any other company "selling" tickets to 3rd party companies owned by Ticketmaster or others themselves should be illegal, it's a con. It's so they can make a massive amount of money off people's fandoms but make it look like it's random people.
